column5: it's as if I write, as I understand you

I understand what you mean, not long time ago I opened to my mother, that I think of suicide. (They say it helps when talking about that with other people). But no, it doesn't help, she just closes her eyes on it. Yes it is difficult for me and I need help, that we talked about that for a few hours, it does not mean that I stop thoughts about it.
